_meanings:
{@--15@} The course
of events, fate, fortune.

{@--17@} The diurnal motion
of a planet in its orbit.

{@--18@} A 
running wound or sore, fistula.

{@--21@} A stage or period of life
(as {#SESava, yOvana, vArDaka#}).

{@--22@} (In
<ab>gram.</ab>) A term for prepositions and
some other adverbial prefixes
(such as {#alaM, tiras#} &c.) when 
immediately connected with the tenses
of a verb or verbal derivatives.

{@--23@}
Position of a child at birth.
